Institutional selling vs retail bullishness divergence
Rate cut expectations supporting risk assets
Crypto regulatory clarity and institutional adoption
Technology sector rotation and mega-cap deterioration

Technical support breakdown at critical levels (SPX 6800, QQQ 609)
Zero bid strength on rallies suggesting supply overwhelming demand
Banking sector stress and crypto counterparty risks
Geopolitical supply chain disruptions and China tensions
